text: Wilczyce is a village in the administrative district of Gmina Krotoszyce, within Legnica County, Lower Silesian Voivodeship, in south-western Poland. Prior to 1945 it was in Germany. It lies approximately north of Krotoszyce, south-west of Legnica, and west of the regional capital Wrocław. ==References== Wilczyce
title: Wilczyce, Legnica County
